description: Coefficients of even indexed Euler polynomials (falling powers without zeros).
references: M. Abramowitz and I. A. Stegun, eds., Handbook of Mathematical Functions, National Bureau of Standards Applied Math. Series 55, 1964 (and various reprintings), p. 809.
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
M. Abramowitz and I. A. Stegun, eds., Handbook of Mathematical Functions, National Bureau of Standards, Applied Math. Series 55, Tenth Printing, 1972 [alternative scanned copy].
Z.-W. Sun, Introduction to Bernoulli and Euler polynomials
formula: E(n, x) = 2/(n+1) * [B(n+1, x) - 2^(n+1)*B(n+1, x/2) ], with B(n, x) the Bernoulli polynomials.
mathematica: Table[ CoefficientList[ EulerE[2*n, x], x] // Reverse // DeleteCases[#, 0]&, {n, 0, 9}] // Flatten (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Jun 21 2013 *)
crossrefs: E(2n, 1/2)*(-4)^n = A000364(n) (signless Euler numbers without zeros).
Cf. A060083 (rising powers), A060096-7 (Euler polynomials), A004172 (with zeros).
Columns (left edge) include A000330, A053132. Columns (right edge) include A001469.
author: _Wolfdieter Lang_, Mar 29 2001
